turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello! Would you like to hear about Save The Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sounds like a good organization

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I assure you that it is a wonderful organization! Your donation would be essential to help ensure children's rights to health, education, and safety. Your donation will make a tangible impact for the world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Is this the charity that they want us to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, we would be ever so happy if you want to donate to this charity. Your donation would go to a very trustable fund.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would love to donate.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Fantastic! What is an amount you are comfortable donating?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Is this a mutual donation, from both of us.  Or do you represent the charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am representing the charity and I am hoping that you will consider donating directly from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to $2. Of course, Your $2 would make the most difference to these neglected children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am willing to donate $1.  That seems to be fair to all.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you so much for your generosity! The children of our organization will be so fortunate and happy to receive this. So many of these children are living in war zones in undeveloped countries. They face violence every day. 1,000 children were killed in the first 2 months of 2018. If you consider increasing your donation to $2, this will help DOUBLE the amount of children and our charity will match your donation at that level!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I think I will stick to the $1.  That would make me happy to help.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We are so happy that you are helping as well. The children will really benefit from this. Last year, many children died from hunger because we did not get enough donations to fully feed their families. Even small amounts of change can mean the difference between life or death for the little ones. Is there any way you could consider going to $1.50? I just spoke with my manager and wonderful news! She said the charity would STILL be willing to match if you go up just that small increment!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I love helping the children.  If you would consider the matching that amount of the $1, that would double the donation of $2 .

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I will have to check with my manager. In the meantime, can I confirm your donation of $1 to our charity?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Absolutely, I am glad to be able to participate for such a worthy cause.  Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No, thank you for being such a compassionate person!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You are more than welcome.
